title: What font is this? Sort of handwritten-ish
content:
What font is this? Thank you,

Font: 

 Bergamot 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080835/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content:
It looks like **Bergamot (Bold)** by Emily Conners [2012]:  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bergamot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417080835/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bergamot/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bergamot/")
